books.title: The Hobbit
books.description: Bilbo Baggins is a hobbit who enjoys a comfortable, unambitious life, rarely traveling any farther than his pantry or cellar.
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.description: The Lord of the Rings is an epic high fantasy novel written by English author and scholar J. R. R. Tolkien. The story began as a sequel to Tolkien's 1937 fantasy novel The Hobbit, but eventually developed into a much larger work.
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

books.title: The Silmarillion
books.description: The Silmarillion is a legendarium, or a compendium of myths, compiled by J. R. R. Tolkien. It was published in 1977, seven years after Tolkien's death, by his son Christopher, with additional assistance from his daughter Priscilla.
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

books.title: The Fellowship of the Ring
books.description: The Fellowship of the Ring is the first volume of J. R. R. Tolkien's epic adventure The Lord of the Rings. It is followed by The Two Towers and The Return of the King.
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
